meanings.sent1: The toy blocks are constructable, allowing children to build various structures.
meanings.sent2: The constructable materials were used to create a new playground for the community.
meanings.sent3: The constructable puzzle seemed easy at first, but it turned out to be quite challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like constructable pieces of a puzzle, fitting together perfectly to form a complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The Lego set was so constructable that even beginners could easily assemble it.

meanings.definition: Capable of being built or created.
meanings.sent1: The constructable model airplane kit provided hours of fun for the kids.
meanings.sent2: The constructable bridge design impressed the engineers with its innovative approach.
meanings.sent3: The constructable sandcastle stood proudly on the beach until the tide washed it away.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like constructable castles in the sky, waiting to be brought to life.
meanings.sent5: The team worked together to come up with a constructable plan for the new building project.
